docs.lead_paragraph: Tunisia agreed Friday to speed its acceptance of 1,500 citizens whose asylum applications were rejected by Germany, accepting a 250-million-euro ($264 million) loan to help develop rural regions and create jobs for young people.

headline.print_headline: Berlin Truck Attack Prompts Accord Between Germany, Tunisia
headline.main: Berlin Truck Attack Prompts Accord Between Germany, Tunisia

docs.snippet: Tunisia agreed Friday to speed its acceptance of 1,500 citizens whose asylum applications were rejected by Germany, accepting a 250-million-euro ($264 million) loan to help develop rural regions and create jobs for young people....

docs.lead_paragraph: Mauricio Pochettino will take a late call on whether in-form striker Harry Kane plays in Sunday's Premier League match against Everton, with the Tottenham Hotspur manager unwilling to take any risks with his star striker who is nursing an injury.

headline.print_headline: Tottenham Yet to Decide Whether Kane Plays Against Everton
headline.main: Tottenham Yet to Decide Whether Kane Plays Against Everton

docs.snippet: Mauricio Pochettino will take a late call on whether in-form striker Harry Kane plays in Sunday's Premier League match against Everton, with the Tottenham Hotspur manager unwilling to take any risks with his star striker who is nursing an injury....

docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma-based Native American tribe filed a lawsuit in its own tribal court system Friday accusing several oil companies of triggering the state's largest earthquake that caused extensive damage to some near-century-old tribal buildings.

headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Tribe Sues Oil Companies in Tribal Court Over Quake
headline.main: Oklahoma Tribe Sues Oil Companies in Tribal Court Over Quake

docs.snippet: An Oklahoma-based Native American tribe filed a lawsuit in its own tribal court system Friday accusing several oil companies of triggering the state's largest earthquake that caused extensive damage to some near-century-old tribal buildings....

docs.lead_paragraph: European Union foreign ministers are to discuss whether to hold high-level talks with Israel soon amid concern over its settlement policy and commitment to a two-state solution, diplomats said Friday.

headline.print_headline: EU to Weigh High-Level Talks With Israel
headline.main: EU to Weigh High-Level Talks With Israel

docs.snippet: European Union foreign ministers are to discuss whether to hold high-level talks with Israel soon amid concern over its settlement policy and commitment to a two-state solution, diplomats said Friday....

docs.lead_paragraph: A man has been indicted in the slaying of an employee at a central Kentucky group home where he lived.

headline.print_headline: Group Home Resident Indicted in Fatal Stabbing of Employee
headline.main: Group Home Resident Indicted in Fatal Stabbing of Employee

docs.lead_paragraph: Belgian authorities released on Friday a man with previous militant links who had been detained a day earlier after two gas cylinders were found in a van he was driving.

headline.print_headline: Belgium Frees Driver Detained for Carrying Gas Cylinders
headline.main: Belgium Frees Driver Detained for Carrying Gas Cylinders

docs.snippet: Belgian authorities released on Friday a man with previous militant links who had been detained a day earlier after two gas cylinders were found in a van he was driving....

docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish and German foreign ministers have agreed to meet in Germany on March 8 to discuss tensions between the two countries after the cancellation of Turkish ministers' rallies, foreign ministry sources in Ankara said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Turkey, Germany Foreign Ministers to Meet to Discuss Ties: Sources
headline.main: Turkey, Germany Foreign Ministers to Meet to Discuss Ties: Sources

docs.snippet: Turkish and German foreign ministers have agreed to meet in Germany on March 8 to discuss tensions between the two countries after the cancellation of Turkish ministers' rallies, foreign ministry sources in Ankara said on Friday....

docs.lead_paragraph: The main pro-Russian separatist leader in Ukraine said on Friday he would cut economic ties between rebel territory and the rest of the country, following through on an ultimatum to end trade if the government did not halt a rail blockade.

headline.print_headline: Separatist Leader Severs Trade Ties With Ukraine Over Rail Blockade
headline.main: Separatist Leader Severs Trade Ties With Ukraine Over Rail Blockade

docs.snippet: The main pro-Russian separatist leader in Ukraine said on Friday he would cut economic ties between rebel territory and the rest of the country, following through on an ultimatum to end trade if the government did not halt a rail blockade....

docs.lead_paragraph: Two people were killed after fire broke out at a camp housing hundreds of migrants who pick fruit and vegetables in the fields of southern Italy, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Fire Kills Two in Italy Migrant Farm Workers' 'Ghetto'
headline.main: Fire Kills Two in Italy Migrant Farm Workers' 'Ghetto'

docs.snippet: Two people were killed after fire broke out at a camp housing hundreds of migrants who pick fruit and vegetables in the fields of southern Italy, officials said....

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump will meet with German Chancellor Angela Merkel (AHN'-geh-lah MEHR'-kuhl) at the White House later this month.

headline.print_headline: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House
headline.main: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House
